menu.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant
menu.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Could we have the menu, please?
a three-course set menu (=dishes which you do not choose for yourself)
Is there any fish on the menu?
menu.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a list of things on a computer screen which you can ask the computer to do
menu.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Select PRINT from the main menu.
menu.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: Sandy read the menu, but didn’t see anything he wanted to eat.
He looked at the menu and decided to have the salad.
Erika began planning a menu for the dinner party.
He ordered a chicken dish from the menu.
The restaurant is offering a three-course menu for New Year’s Eve.
The new restaurant on Fifth Street has an excellent menu.
The menu is extensive and adventurous.
There is an extensive dinner menu, and seafood is a speciality.
Dinner is three courses from a set menu.
In the evening there is a full à la carte menu.
I asked the waiter if there was a children’s menu.
menu.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a list of choices that appears on a computer screen, allowing you to choose certain operations or run particular processes, using a MOUSE
menu.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Go to the menu at the top of your screen and select ‘File’.
